Package natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer

Interface Summary
RDGTransformer RDGTransformer is an interface for classes that transform the Rhetorical Dependency Graph.
 

Class Summary
BeVerbs Class containing the verbs that require 'to be' as auxiliary verb when using past perfect May be better to use a .txt file
Conjunctor At the moment this class creates a grammatical Dependency Tree out of a relation and a appropriate cue word.
DepTreeTransformer DepTreeTransformator performs operations on a RSDepTreeModel, such as removing and adding nodes.
Elliptor The Elliptor class performs Ellipsis.
InferenceModule This module is responsible for applying inference rules with the generation of referring expressions.
Morphology Inflects the root of a given RSDepTreeNode, using NounLib of VerbLib
Orthography Performs Orthography.
ReferringExpressionGenerator This component is responsible for the generation of adequate and varied referring expressions, and is part of the Surface Realizer
RelationTransformer This class transforms a rhetorical dependency graph into one or more dependency trees, which may be connected by a cue word
SurfaceRealizer The SurfaceRealizer takes an URL or a File, reads the rhetorical dependency graph and transforms it to a Surface Form, contained in a String.
